title: Worker at childcare facility accused of setting up camera in centre toilets - Yahoo7
text:
Share Worker at childcare facility accused of setting up camera in centre toilets - Yahoo7 A worker at a childcare centre in Perth’s south has been sacked after a spy camera was found hidden in the centre’s toilets. Close Childcare worker charged over hidden toilet camera UP NEXT VIDEO Childcare worker charged over hidden toilet camera. Source: 7 News Childcare worker charged over hidden toilet camera 
It’s alleged the 50-year-old hid the camera at the Gowrie Early Years Childcare Centre in Karawarra. 
The device was found hidden in a pest control device in the staff toilets last week. A camera was found hidden in staff toilets. Picture: 7 News 
The centre has reassured parents no child was exposed to the recording device, and said it is implementing a review of all operating procedures. 
The man had been employed as a maintenance worker, and also carried out duties at a Kewdale centre. The man has been sacked. Picture: 7 News 
While there was no camera found at that centre, investigations by police have revealed there may have been in the past. 
The man has been charged with using an optical surveillance device to record a private activity. 
He will face court next month.
